title: Bitnomial Prepares to Debut First CFTC-Regulated Spot Crypto Market
contentSnippet: The move marks the first time spot crypto assets can trade on a federally regulated commodities venue, signaling the CFTC’s accelerating push to oversee retail digital-asset markets.

title: Largest Solana treasury recruits ParaFi Capital exec after over 40% plunge in holdings value
contentSnippet: Ryan Navi, who previously served at ParaFi Capital as managing director and head of venture, will lead Forward's SOL treasury strategy.

title: Vitalik Buterin: 'Dark Hand' of Token Voting Could Erode Zcash Privacy
contentSnippet: A committee endorsement has reignited long-running questions about whether Zcash should preserve its off-chain governance structure.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Buys More Ethereum—But Both ETH and BMNR Are Diving
contentSnippet: The firm's stock dropped Monday as crypto prices plummeted, but it remains up 301% year-to-date.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP ETFs Bounce Back After Brutal Month for Crypto Funds
contentSnippet: Crypto prices are falling again Monday, but Bitcoin, XRP, and Ethereum funds are coming off a strong week for flows following recent losses.

title: JPMorgan and Strike CEO Jack Mallers Go Silent, Leaving 'Debanking' Questions Unanswered
contentSnippet: For now, Jack Mallers decided to not comment any further and JPMorgan declined to explain why it debanked the CEO of a company very similar to newly launched JPM Coin.

title: U.S. House Lawmakers Detail Grievances Over Government's 'Choke Point 2.0'
contentSnippet: French Hill, the chairman of the House Financial Services Committee, issued a report outlining what went on at several U.S. crypto regulators in past years.

title: Hedera Tumbles 10% to Crucial Support on Heavy Volume
contentSnippet: Hedera’s 10% drop on Dec. 1 has pushed HBAR back to a key support zone, where consolidation, fading volume, and institutional selling pressure are shaping the next move.

title: Chainlink's LINK Slides 11% as Technical Breakdown Overshadows ETF Launch News
contentSnippet: The token broke below $12, breaching key support levels with heavy trading volume, confirming the downtrend.

title: Trump Media and Crypto.com's $6 Billion Cronos Treasury Inches Closer to Public Debut
contentSnippet: Trump Media and Crypto.com have teamed up to launch a publicly traded Cronos (CRO) treasury—and they're gearing up for the potential debut.

title: Bitcoin Mining Profitability Fell for Fourth Consecutive Month in November: JPMorgan
contentSnippet: The average network hashrate fell 1% last month after hitting record highs in October.

title: Changpeng Zhao-backed YZiLabs launches boardroom coup at BNB treasury firm BNC
contentSnippet: YZiLabs says BNB Network’s rollout has faltered, citing sluggish investor updates and a gap between the stock and its underlying BNB holdings.

title: Over $650M Liquidated! China confirms Crypto Illegal! Infinex Interview!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors slid sharply, reversing all of last week’s gains, with BTC down 6% to $85,800, ETH down 6% to $2,820, BNB falling 7% to $822, and SOL dropping 7% to $127. Among top movers, MYX (+15%) an

title: ICP Slides as Breakdown Below $4.00 Triggers Elevated Volatility
contentSnippet: Sharp 24-hour decline sends Internet Computer into fresh multi-day lows, with a high-volume support breach defining the session

title: BONK Slides 9% as Technical Breakdown Overshadows Swiss ETP Debut
contentSnippet: A new ETP listing in Switzerland failed to lift BONK as the memecoin fell to fresh cycle lows amid a sharp technical breach of key support.

title: Digital Asset Treasuries Lead Crypto Stock Sell-Off as Bitcoin Falls to $84K
contentSnippet: Strategy fell to the lowest since October, 2024, and ether and solana treasury plays including BitMine, Sharplink, Solana Company, Upexi tumbled nearly 10%.

title: China Eyes Fresh Crackdown on Crypto Amid Resurgence in Speculative Trading
contentSnippet: Authorities warn that crypto activity remains illegal and poses renewed risks despite years of enforcement.

title: European Authorities Seize $1.51B Bitcoin-Mixing Service Cryptomixer
contentSnippet: Europol dismantled a crypto-mixing platform it said is used by ransomware groups and darknet markets to launder bitcoin, seizing servers, data and $29 million in BTC.

title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy Establishes $1.44 Billion USD Reserve—But Still Might Sell BTC
contentSnippet: Michael Saylor changed his tune on selling Bitcoin, stating that Strategy could dump BTC to pay dividends to its stockholders.

title: Tom Lee’s Ethereum DAT BitMine now holds 3% of the total ETH supply
contentSnippet: Chairman Tom Lee said the firm acquired 96,798 ETH in the past week alone, a 39% weekly increase, despite market turbulence.

title: White House AI and crypto czar David Sacks rejects fresh conflict of interest claims
contentSnippet: Sacks' legal team claimed the outlet ignored ethics guidance and relied on debunked allegations to sustain a predetermined narrative.

title: Morning Minute: Over $650M Liquidated as BTC Erases Last Week's Gains
contentSnippet: It was a Thanksgiving week of crypto price action to be grateful for—until it wasn't.

title: Kalshi and Polymarket post strongest months yet with nearly $10 billion in combined November volume
contentSnippet: Market share data shows the pair now dominates sector-wide flows, forming a fast-consolidating duopoly amid growing capital formation.

title: Strategy purchases another 130 bitcoin for $11.7M as total holdings hit 650,000 BTC; establishes new $1.44B dividend reserve
contentSnippet: Strategy's holdings account for more than 3% of the total 21 million bitcoin supply — worth around $56 billion.

title: Gold Closes in On All-Time High as Crypto, Stocks Tumble
contentSnippet: Gold is approaching a record high as Bitcoin and stocks fall, driven by “growing caution among investors” amid dovish Fed expectations.

title: Crypto operating businesses ‘look strong,’ despite weak price action: Bernstein
contentSnippet: Analysts pointed to Coinbase's expanding product lines, token launches, and new consumer apps as examples of "transformative" shifts.

title: Germany, Switzerland Shut Down $1.4B Crypto Mixer in Cross-Border Operation: Europol
contentSnippet: The takedown of Cryptomixer disrupts a nine-year-old laundering hub relied upon by ransomware groups and darknet markets.

title: Bitcoin faces ‘late-cycle fragility’ as whale accumulation slows, retail interest surges: analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s drop to $86,000 has coincided with slowing whale accumulation and rising retail buying — a late-cycle pattern that, analysts say, heightens fragility.

title: Crypto ETPs rebound with over $1 billion in weekly inflows prior to latest price slump: CoinShares
contentSnippet: The inflows marked a rebound following a four-week negative streak totaling $5.7 billion, but came ahead of the latest market slump on Monday.

title: Sony Bank to launch US stablecoin for games and anime: report
contentSnippet: Sony Bank's upcoming stablecoin is designed to be mainly used by U.S. customers of Sony's games and anime content.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
